Song:
  Tempo: 100
  Kit:
    - bass:   test/sounds/bass_mono_8.wav
    - snare:  test/sounds/snare_mono_8.wav
    - hihat:  []   # Empty composite sounds aren't allowed
  Flow:
    - Verse:  x2
    - Chorus: x2

Verse:
  - bass:    X...X...
  - snare:   ..X...X.
Chorus:
  - bass:    XXXXXXXX
  - hihat:   .X.X.X.X
